text: (eyaṭa ema dūtayin ovunṭa) “obagē mutun mittan kumak mata siṭinu oba duṭuvehuda, īṭat vaḍā ṛju mārgaya mā oba veta genævit siṭiyadīda, (obagē mutun mittanva oba anugamanaya karannē)?” yayi vimasūha. eyaṭa ovun “(esēya! ovunvama api anugamanaya karana atara) oba gena ā dæyada niyata vaśayenma api pratikṣēpa karannemu” yayida pævasūha
